Bodhi Doubt/ Detox Antioxidant Care Serum

Brand: Bodhi

Category: Serums & Essences

Ingredients: Water (Aqua), Sodium Hyaluronate, Aspalathus Linearis (Red Tea) Extract, Phenoxyethanol, Ethylhexylglycerin.

Category: Serums & Essences

Ingredients: Water (Aqua), Sodium Hyaluronate, Aspalathus Linearis (Red Tea) Extract, Phenoxyethanol, Ethylhexylglycerin.

Directions: After cleansing, apply 2-5 drops of serum into hands. Rub together and press into skin. Use this concentrated formula morning and night to nurture, soothe and visibly firm the skin.

Directions: After cleansing, apply 2-5 drops of serum into hands. Rub together and press into skin. Use this concentrated formula morning and night to nurture, soothe and visibly firm the skin.

Ingredient concerns: MODERATE: Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
